template.name: fb1
template.value: <g> <text x="10" y="250">медленно</text> <text x="490" y="250" text-anchor="end">быстро</text> <text x="250" y="20" text-anchor="middle">Легко</text> <text x="250" y="500" text-anchor="middle">Сложно</text> </g>

template.name: fb3
fb4
template.value:
<svg style="width: 500px;height: 200px;background: linear-gradient(#ffb800, yellow, #6cde00, yellow, #ffb800)">
 <text x = 250 y = 200 text-anchor="middle">Сложно</text>
    <text x = 250 y = 20 text-anchor="middle">Легко</text>
${
                (function () {
                    const seconds = state.allReactions.map(r => r.time.seconds);
                    const max = Math.max(...seconds);
                    const min = Math.min(...seconds);
                    const diff = max - min;

                    return state.allReactions.map(r => {
                        const x = (((r.time.seconds - min) / diff) || 0) * 500;
                        const y = r.y / 2.5;

                        return svg`
                    <circle r = 3 cx="${x}" cy="${y}" fill="black"></circle>`
                    });
                }())

            }
            </svg>
 <svg style="width: 500px;height: 200px;background: linear-gradient(#ffb800, yellow, #6cde00, yellow, #ffb800)">
    <text x = 250 y = 200 text-anchor="middle">Быстро</text>
    <text x = 250 y = 20 text-anchor="middle">Медленно</text>
                ${
                (function () {
                    const seconds = state.allReactions.map(r => r.time.seconds);
                    const max = Math.max(...seconds);
                    const min = Math.min(...seconds);
                    const diff = max - min;

                    return state.allReactions.map(r => {
                        const x = (((r.time.seconds - min) / diff) || 0) * 500;
                        const y = r.x / 2.5;

                        return svg`
                    <circle r = 3 cx="${x}" cy="${y}" fill="black"></circle>`
                    });
                }())

            }
            </svg>
